data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Świ, Jolanta (2017): A monograph of the Afrotropical Cassidinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae). Part 4. Revision of the genus Chiridopsis Spaeth. Zootaxa 4316 (1): 1-85, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4316.1.1|423 occurrences
